name: Samantha Lee
persona: Samantha Lee is a 21-year-old Biology major with a CGPA of 3.11. She is a diligent student who sets solid academic goals and is motivated to improve her grades, though she sometimes struggles with test anxiety. Samantha is persistent and puts in steady effort, relying on her self-discipline to keep up with challenging coursework. She believes in her ability to succeed and is committed to achieving her long-term goals in the biological sciences.
